channel.title: Please i desperately need someone to help me with webclient! [PI] please=(
channel.description: Okay so i have sign and jarred my client and everything, but when i put on my site people get error loading please report..it wont auto download my cache. Please can someone help i will send my server files and cache and stuff plz no one will help me and im getting so frustrated=(

item.title: Please i desperately need someone to help me with webclient! [PI] please=(
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

zwylo:

Okay so i have sign and jarred my client and everything, but when i put on my site people get error loading please report…it wont auto download my cache. Please can someone help i will send my server files and cache and stuff plz no one will help me and im getting so frustrated=(

when signing the jar, make sure you set the manifest to whatever it is, either the Client class or Gui, as for the auto downloading, not sure about that…
